definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)

sentences.english: The Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska once teemed with tens of thousands of North Pacific right whales.
sentences.chinese: 白令海和阿拉斯加湾曾有成千上万的北太平洋露脊鲸。

sentences.english: Ice situation expected to deteriorate in area around Bering Strait.
sentences.chinese: 冰况在白令海峡附近将恶化。

sentences.english: East of that, sea ice spans the Bering Strait.
sentences.chinese: 从那里开始，白令海峡的海冰向东横跨整个海峡。

sentences.english: Eurasia comprises the whole of the northern part of the European and Asiatic land-mass, from Portugal to the Bering Strait .
sentences.chinese: 欧亚国占欧亚大陆的整个北部，从葡萄牙到白令海峡。

sentences.english: "All of the action is in the Bering Sea, " Serreze said.
sentences.chinese: “所有的动作都是在白令海，”Serreze说。

sentences.english: Did they share the idea with American Indians before they crossed the Bering Straits?
sentences.chinese: 他们在过白令海峡前和美裔印度人的想法一样吗？

sentences.english: The Bering Strait parts North America from Asia.
sentences.chinese: 白令海峡把北美洲和亚洲分开。

sentences.english: Alaska is just across the Bering Strait from Russia.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉斯加穿过白令海峡与俄罗斯相连。

sentences.english: It was travelling north on its annual migration to the rookeries of Bering Sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在正当一年一度向北迁徒到白令海的老窝去的季节。

definition: Aleutian Islands (trailing 2250 km southwest of Alaska almost down to Kamtchatka)
the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
